item.description:
LAST PERFORMANCE OF THE SEASON!

Dinner 5:45 pm
Concert: 7:30 pm

Places in our Hearts
Copland Our Town
Bernstein On the Waterfront
Resphigi Pines of Rome

We have arranged a very special deal with Claflin Hill to get almost 50% off the regular ticket price. Cost is only $20 per person. (Regular price is $35) You may pay when you arrive.

Meet in the Town Hall parking at 5:45 pm to walk over to the Turtle Tavern for dinner. See more details below about dinner. If you are skipping dinner and meeting us at the performance, go to the ticket booth, buy your ticket for $20, and tell them you're with Jacki Rose's meetup group. Find your seat and we will be there. Seats are assigned and we are all together. If you need to contact me the night of the show, my cell# is 508-381-1529

Meet at the Town Hall parking lot on Court Street at 5:45 pm. We'll walk to the Turtle Tavern casual/affordable pub, located at 72 Main Street. If you arrive after 5:45, meet us over there. It's just one block up on the same side of the street as the Town Hall.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Town Hall parking lot at 5:45 on Court Street. Or at 7:15 at ticket booth.
item.name: Dinner and Symphony in Milford
